subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: As the Knicks prepared to play the Chicago Bulls Tuesday night, Isiah Thomas talked about why he keeps plugging away as coach, despite the losing, the stress and the “Fire Isiah” chants.
snippet: As the Knicks prepared to play the Chicago Bulls Tuesday night, Isiah Thomas talked about why he keeps plugging away as coach, despite the losing, the stress and the “Fire Isiah” chants.
